thread.title: Katti Batti box office collections: Imran Khan, Kangana Ranaut starrer reports 30%-35% occupancy rate
thread.title_full: Katti Batti box office collections: Imran Khan, Kangana Ranaut starrer reports 30%-35% occupancy rate | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Katti Batti box office collections: Imran Khan, Kangana Ranaut starrer reports 30%-35% occupancy rate
text:
Other Articles Scribe's question on my sexuality was humiliating: Tom Hardy Beyonce should be covered up: Louis Farrakhan tells Jay Z 'Star Trek Beyond' release delayed by two weeks Much is expected of Katti Batti box office collections and the Rs 100 crore figure has been bandied out with nonchalance by industry analysts. The reason behind this ‘recipe for success’ is that Katti Batti stars Imran Khan and especially, Kangana Ranaut , who has transformed into a B.O. queen due to her recent movies turning into virtual goldmines for producers.
Kangana Ranaut has burnished her reputation immensely with her ability to draw crowds to theatres with the off-beat characterisation of common girl themes that tend to transcend most acceptable brackets in India. A repeat performance is anticipated with Katti Batti.
While last week’s release Hero will not up up any resistance against Katti Batti as a rival to the box office collections take, another release may well pose a problem. We are talking about Messenger of God (MSG 2), starring godman Gurmeet Ram Rahim, which did phenomenally well when its first part had hit theatres. However, while at the first instance it had received a lot of attention due to the controversy then generated, this time that same ‘magic formula’ may not work. Having said that, MSG 2 caused a huge traffic jam in Gurgaon a couple of days ago during a special screening.
On the ground, it is being reported that Katti Batti box office collections are set for a nasty surprise as the occupancy rate in theatres is just 30%-35%, which is a massive setback as it has been promoted very well indeed. The weekend collections now will be dependent a lot on the word of mouth.
Take the opinion poll, tell us what you think:
Take Our Poll ‘Katti Batti’ box office collections: Imran Khan could not be bothered less
Just ahead of the release of his film, Imran Khan says ‘Katti Batti’ box office collections were not really something that he is bothered about.
Speaking to the media 32-year-old Imran Khan said, “To be really honest, I am not really bothered about the commercial success of this movie. I am really happy and content as a creative person, as an actor, as a filmmaker. It’s a film which I am really proud of.”
Imran Khan continued that all he really wants is people to appreciate the movie and praise the work which he and Kangana Ranaut have done.
The ‘Delhi Belly ‘star, who will be seen with Kangana Ranaut for the first time, also said that he has always been a fan of her work.
Imran Khan was last seen in ‘Gori Tere Pyaar Main’ movie in 2013.
‘Katti Batti’ is an upcoming Indian romantic comedy movie based on modern-day relationships and is directed by Nikhil Advani. ‘Katti Batti’ released on Friday September 18, 2015.
(With inputs from Bollywood Hungama)
First Published on September 18, 2015 12:17 pm
